paragraphs: 3 years in AdTech, starting in 2021 as Sr Analyst at Xandr, supporting top-tier clients, analyzing trends, and bridging teams for optimal solutions. In 2022, joined Microsoft as Sr Technical Support Engineer, focusing on automation. Developed an internal hub with 11 tools, saving up to 6 hours of manual work. Now part of a team owning and maintaining 36 tools. Skills: Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Tailwind CSS, Unit Tests, Docker, Git, REST APIs, Swagger, Express.
